rules_text:
Whenever this creature transforms into Tanith, Deputy Commander, each opponent loses 1 life for each creature token you control.
[i]Aspiring Leader[/i] – Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
[i]Begnion's Flight[/i] – Whenever Tanith, Deputy Commander attacks, for each opponent, create a 2/2 white Pegasus Knight creature token that is attacking that player.
